channel.title: Lethanix
channel.description: This is my portafolio and blog where I talk about cloud, linux and software development.

item.title: All in one
item.description: Your blog description, which is long text, can be an introduction to the post or a paragraph of the post.
item.content:encoded: Use [Vitesse Them for Astro](https://astro.build/themes/details/vitesse-theme-for-astro/) to start writing your blog posts.
item.author: Lethanix <me@lethanix.com>

item.title: 博客标题
item.description: If you set the lang field to include zh, it will display an identifier.
item.content:encoded: Use [Vitesse Them for Astro](https://astro.build/themes/details/vitesse-theme-for-astro/) to start writing your blog posts.
item.author: Lethanix <me@lethanix.com>

item.title: Tags
item.description: A tag field is provided, which can be used to display custom information.
item.content:encoded: Use [Vitesse Them for Astro](https://astro.build/themes/details/vitesse-theme-for-astro/) to start writing your blog posts.
item.author: Lethanix <me@lethanix.com>

item.title: External link redirect
item.description: If you need to link to an external address, you can set the redirect field.
item.content:encoded: Use [Vitesse Them for Astro](https://astro.build/themes/details/vitesse-theme-for-astro/) to start writing your blog posts.
item.author: Lethanix <me@lethanix.com>

item.title: Video Icon
item.description: If you want to tell the visitor that there is a video, you can set the video field to true.
item.content:encoded: Use [Vitesse Them for Astro](https://astro.build/themes/details/vitesse-theme-for-astro/) to start writing your blog posts.
item.author: Lethanix <me@lethanix.com>

item.title: One year apart
item.description: Vitesse theme groups posts by year and displays them sorted by date.
item.content:encoded: Use [Vitesse Them for Astro](https://astro.build/themes/details/vitesse-theme-for-astro/) to start writing your blog posts.
item.author: Lethanix <me@lethanix.com>

item.title: Blog duration
item.description: You can set a duration to tell the viewer how long it will take to watch it。
item.content:encoded: Use [Vitesse Them for Astro](https://astro.build/themes/details/vitesse-theme-for-astro/) to start writing your blog posts.
item.author: Lethanix <me@lethanix.com>

item.title: Minimum info
item.description: The date and title fields are required.
item.content:encoded: Use [Vitesse Them for Astro](https://astro.build/themes/details/vitesse-theme-for-astro/) to start writing your blog posts.
